Replace.Text: Kappa Heavy Industries
Kappa Heavy Industries
Kappa
Xuanwu Lake
Technician in the water
All floodplains in the city give +1 charm to surrounding plots, +1 [ICON_FOOD] food, [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, [ICON_CULTURE] culture to stunning plots

Most of the Kappa live in Xuanwujian, and there are a large number of them, building a social system. As far as the whole kappa group is concerned, their craftsmanship is very exquisite and they are good at making props. It seems to retain advanced technology that is difficult for humans to understand. But that technology only works for some monsters. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] The Kappa market is held periodically. In order to raise funds for research, they held meetings to sell finished products that the funds were proud of. Although many important inventions of kappa can be obtained here, there will also be many monsters visiting here, and it is difficult for humans to get close to here.
Kawashiro Unloading

Hecheng Hequ is very fragile in the early stage, and defense may be a bit difficult. They must seize the time to explore the world, develop as soon as possible, and improve various abilities. Once the development is completed in the later stage, it will be particularly easy for them to end the game.

Kappa Heavy Industry's early stage ability is almost zero, so it needs to pay attention to its own protection in the early stage, and at the same time find opportunities to strengthen itself and use the resources at hand to develop as soon as possible. In the mid-term, through the improved facilities that have already been added, and the planning and construction of the region, etc., the city's output will be continuously improved, so that it will gradually surpass the opponent in all aspects, and after the completion of the later development, it will overwhelm the opponent and easily end the game.
Well - the [NEWLINE] got a good sample

Mr. Hecheng Hecho, the technology you created has amazed human beings and even the same kind. During the mutation, the machine made out of my own interest was picked up by the witches, and the patents were robbed by the same clan, and I was not moved. I even helped the witches upgrade their functions. What a great spirit. This time you will lead us again and bring the wonders of science to everyone in the world.
Ultra Yokai Slug

If the city is adjacent to a river, there is no [ICON_Citizen] population limit for regional construction. Every time the city completes a specialized area, +3% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity (maximum 60%) + 2% [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value (maximum 40%)

A member of the Kappa inhabiting the Xuanwu Stream. In her canvas bag and the pockets of her clothes, there are all kinds of tools, materials, fuels, and mysterious substances. If you're just doing some physics props, these should be enough. But I heard that she is not good at making magic props or spell props. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] She has a timid side. When she is alone, if other humans or monsters approach her, she will often run away. In the circle of friends, he is very cheerful and lively, and will adopt an arrogant attitude when he cannot escape. It seems that she looks down on humans and other monsters from the bottom of her heart, but it is not difficult to see that she is bluffing.
『Made in Kotori』

Independent area, no maintenance fee, no great man points, no construction limit, no price increase, and unlocked engineering technology. (requires population)[NEWLINE]Provides corresponding standard bonuses for every other vanilla region, and additional adjacency bonuses when adjacent to itself, comes with +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Technology Value. Each of this area provides 2 points of [ICON_Power] electricity to the city. [NEWLINE]The [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity bonus of the "Craftsman" and "Five-Year Plan" policy cards also apply to this area, which is 100% of the [ICON_SCIENCE] technology of the [NEWLINE] "Natural Philosophy" and "Five-Year Plan" policy cards The value bonus also applies to this area, at 100%

Kappa are skilled in craftsmanship, good at making props, and possess advanced technologies that are difficult for human beings to understand. Under such circumstances, they built their own fully automatic area, which can continue to work without the blessing of the population, and continuously provide resources for the surrounding area. The popularity of automation has brought them unimaginable Convenience and super efficiency.

Kappa's Institute

After researching the wheel, it unlocks the builder's ability to build the Kappa Heavy Industry's unique improvement, the Kappa's Research Institute. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Kappa Heavy Industry's characteristic improvement facility, +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, can be built on the floodplain of the grassland plain near the river. When the charm value of the plot is amazing, then +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value

Kappa's technological leadership is incomprehensible. They attach great importance to technology and have established research institutes in various places to continuously explore the mysteries of the world. In the continuous progress, we also do not forget to improve the efficiency of the research institute and make the functions more powerful, leaving other improved facilities in the dust.
The Planetarium of Hecheng

The characteristic building of Kappa Heavy Industry, built in the college, unlocked by scientific theory and technology, requires a university. +3 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science Provides [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to the adjacency bonus given to the home academy

The shrine maiden who once amazed Gensokyo in a world event, Hetori popularized the planetarium in the empire. The beautiful scenery it brings makes the people of the empire yearn for the endless starry sky even more, to touch the seemingly unreachable stars, and also have an endless yearning for science. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] "Not only can you learn knowledge, but you can also avoid celestial fraud in the morning, right? This is a facility full of wisdom"

It's good for both of us to be able to trade, I like it.
Those who do not trade with others are doomed to die closed in their own world, just like drowning.
A kappa who is good at buying and selling and saves money like his life
Likes to trade with civilizations with [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes. Dislikes civilizations that do not trade with others.
(You have no business relationship with the other party)
Um! very good! This way we are allies!
I don't trust you very much yet, it will take a while.
I think it might be better for us to form an alliance now.
If you accept it, then we will officially declare friendship, not bad.
Do you think the timing is not good, then I will wait for the next time.
If you want to fight, then you have to be prepared to be defeated by me.
I think the apparent peace is about to end, see you on the battlefield.
messenger? Interesting.
I don't think this is good, and the harm to Kappa Heavy Industries is immeasurable.
We have decided to send envoys to your side to strengthen communication, are you willing to accept it?
Blame me, that really scares me.
You're not going to get a good result if you go on like this. (condemns you)
I'm Hecheng Kawashiro, the head of Kappa Heavy Industries. My hobby is making props. Hello.
We are willing to provide the location of our capital. Is this information satisfactory for the first meeting?
The location of your city, well, I understand, thank you.
Would you mind swapping the location of our capital, it would be good for both of us.
Allies can deepen the bond between us, would you like to ally with me.
There are quite a lot of troops, are you trying to scare me?
Is it still defeated after all, damn it.
Like most of my peers, I like the feeling of trading, like now.
Ah, I can't accept this, an unequal transaction.
